p.s: A PHP interface for browsing network services using ZeroConf
p.d: Provides an interface for browsing and publishing network services via ZeroConf using Apple's Rendezvous/OpenTalk library. You can browse the network for specific services like database servers (PostgreSQL, Sybase, InterBase), Apple File Sharing, web services via Apache's mod_rendezvous, etc. and discover the IP address and port for each found service.
